body_html: I keep trying to use clang, but it uses gcc every time. I've tried passing it into command I'm using to build (as in your example), ensuring it was added to PATH (first), setting the environment variables $CC, $CXX, $CMAKE_C_COMPILER, $CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER and so on but every time it references gcc-5. Am I missing something?
